___deliveryAddress.description: The address to which the order will be delivered.

___streetAddress.description: The street number and street name.

___provinceCode.description: The code or abbreviation for the province.

___longitude.description: The longitude of the address. Used when address details are not provided. Ignored otherwise.

___latitude.description: The latitude of the address. Used when address details are not provided. Ignored otherwise.

___countryCode.description: The two-letter ISO-3166 country code. If left blank, we will assume US.

___confirmationPhone.description: The phone number that you would call if there was something wrong with this order or the phone number that was supplied with the shipping information.

___confirmationEmail.description: When this purchase was completed, you likely sent a confirmation email or you will be sending a confirmation email to someone once you approve the order. This is the email address to which that confirmation email will be sent.

___organization.description: If provided by the buyer, the name of the recipient's company or organization.

___fullName.description: The full name of the person receiving the goods. If this item is being shipped, then this field is the person it is being shipping to. Don't assume this name is the same as card.cardHolderName. Only put a value here if the name will actually appear on the shipping label. If this item is digital, then this field will likely be blank.

___expiryMonth.description: MM representation of the expiration month of the card.

___billingAddress.description: The billing address for the card.

___streetAddress.description: The street number and street name.

___provinceCode.description: The code or abbreviation for the province.

___longitude.description: The longitude of the address. Used when address details are not provided. Ignored otherwise.

___latitude.description: The latitude of the address. Used when address details are not provided. Ignored otherwise.

___countryCode.description: The two-letter ISO-3166 country code. If left blank, we will assume US.

___last4.description: The last four digits of the card number.

___expiryYear.description: yyyy representation of the expiration year of the card.

___bin.description: The first six digits of the credit card, the bank identification number, which uniquely identifies the issuer.

___cardHolderName.description: The full name on the credit card that was charged.

___name.description: The business name of the seller.

___shipFromAddress.description: The location from which the seller shipped the order.

___streetAddress.description: The street number and street name.

___provinceCode.description: The code or abbreviation for the province.

___longitude.description: The longitude of the address. Used when address details are not provided. Ignored otherwise.

___latitude.description: The latitude of the address. Used when address details are not provided. Ignored otherwise.

___countryCode.description: The two-letter ISO-3166 country code. If left blank, we will assume US.

___lastOrderId.description: The unique identifier for the last order placed by this account, prior to the current order.

___accountNumber.description: Your unique identifier for the account.

___email.description: The primary email address associated with the account.

___aggregateOrderCount.description: The total count of orders placed by this account since it was created, including the current order.

___phone.description: The phone number association with the account.

___aggregateOrderDollars.description: The total amount spent by this account since it was created, including the current order.

___createdDate.description: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` The date when the account was created. See the Dates section of these docs for more information about date formats.

___username.description: The username associated with the account. Please supply this even if it is the same as the email address.

___lastUpdateDate.description: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` The last time a change was made to this account other than an order being placed. Examples include changing email addresses or adding a new credit card. See the Dates section of these docs for more information about date formats.

___currency.description: The currency type of the order, in 3 letter ISO 4217 format. Defaults to USD.

___paymentGateway.description: The gateway that processed the transaction. For paypal orders use paypal_account.

___orderChannel.description: The method used by the buyer to place the order. Either WEB or PHONE.

___cvvResponseCode.description: The response code from the card verification value (CVV) check. Accepted codes listed on above link.

___orderId.description: A string uniquely identifying this order.

___transactionId.description: The unique identifier provided by the payment gateway for this order. If you have provided us with credentials for your payment gateway we can obtain additional details about the order, like AVS and CVV status, from your payment provider.

___createdAt.description: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` The date and time when the order was placed, shown on the signifyd console. See the Dates section of these docs for more information about date formats.

___totalPrice.description: The total price of the order, including shipping price and taxes.

___paymentMethod.description: The method the user used to complete the

___products.description: The products purchased in the transaction.

___receivedBy.description: If the order was was taken by a customer service or sales agent, his or her name.

___avsResponseCode.description: The response code from the address verification system (AVS). Accepted codes: http://www.emsecommerce.net/avs_cvv2_response_codes.htm

___shipments.description: The shipments association with this purchase

___browserIpAddress.description: The IP Address of the browser that was used to make the  This is the IP Address that was used to connect to your site and make the
